value.title: ACLU sues Clearview AI over 'unlawful' facial recognition technology

value.title: Computer vision and uncertainty in AI for robotic prosthetics

value.title: New models use computer vision and AI to identify COVID-19 in X-rays
value.excerpt: Students at Cranfield University have designed computer models that can identify COVID-19 in X-rays. The models use computer vision and artificial intelligence (AI) to analyze chest X-ray imagery. It can classify information which would not normally be recognized with the naked eye and assist with the diagnosis of COVID-19.

images.title: New models use computer vision and AI to identify COVID-19 in X-rays
